main event: Two triangular objects, white changing to red, blue, yellow, and green, were observed in the sky near Denver, Colorado on July 5, 1967.
interesting points: The objects were observed together initially, then split and traveled in opposite directions.
One object gradually disappeared, while the other remained stationary in the sky.
The objects were observed for about 30 minutes.
The sighting occurred while the observer was watching fireworks.
The observer stated that the objects were observed by several members of his family and by neighbors.
